org.schwering.evi.conf
Class MainConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.schwering.evi.conf.MainConfiguration
public abstract class MainConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Administers the main configuration file.
The format of the file is quite simple: 

 key=value
 # This is a comment
Here's a list of EVI configuration keys:
  • gui.asktoexit (boolean)
  • gui.lookandfeel (String)
  • gui.size (Dimension)
  • gui.topleft (Point)
  • gui.tabs.placement (int)
  • app.sayhello (boolean)
  • app.lang (Locale)
  • app.modulelist (String [in URL format], default ModuleConfigurationPanel.MODULE_LIST_URL)
  • font.primary (Font)
  • font.secondary (Font)

    • Version:
    $Id: MainConfiguration.java 248 2006-06-06 19:47:59Z schwering $
    Author:
    Christoph Schwering (schwering@gmail.com)

    The program's config dir.
    It is tried to set it to ${user.home}/.evi.
